Class BaseTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • r2b.apps.utils.BaseTracker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITracker

    public class BaseTracker
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITracker
    Tracker object or lib factory. If tracking is not available send info to logger on verbose mode.
